#summary Instructions on how to set up the dogvibes suite

= Introduction =

This project has just started so beware of excessive tweaking.


= Procedure =

This needs to be updated with more details.


*Usage of Ubuntu 8.10 is presupposed*

`apt-get install subversion` to be able to check out code

=== Vala ===
  * Download and unpack latest version at http://live.gnome.org/Vala/Release
  * apt-get install flex bison libglib2.0-dev
  * ./configure && make install
  * ldconfig -v

=== libspotify ===
  * Download and unpack latest version at http://developer.spotify.com/en/libspotify/overview/
  * make install
  * ldconfig -v

=== Gstreamer ===
  * cd yourhomedirectory
  * mkdir sandbox
  * mkdir gstreamer-src
  * cd gstreamer-src
  * sudo apt-get install liblame-dev libmad0-dev liboil-dev libasound-dev (probably more packages here)
  * git clone git://anongit.freedesktop.org/gstreamer/gstreamer
  * git clone git://anongit.freedesktop.org/gstreamer/gst-plugins-base
  * git clone git://anongit.freedesktop.org/gstreamer/gst-plugin-good
  * git clone git://anongit.freedesktop.org/gstreamer/gst-plugins-bad
  * git clone git://anongit.freedesktop.org/gstreamer/gst-plugins-ugly
  * git clone git://anongit.freedesktop.org/gstreamer/gst-ffmpeg
  * Iterate for all folders that been checkout in the order you checked them out
  * Iterate start
  * cd folder
  * PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/yourhomedirectory/sandbox/lib/pkgconfig ./autogen.sh --prefix=/yourhomedirectory/sandbox && make install
  * Iterate stop
